tool.name: MethylIT: Count DMPs at gene-body
tool.command: ## TODO: add additional parameters used by the ‘findOverlaps’ ## function (e.g., maxgap, minoverlap, etc). See ## https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/IRanges/versions/2.0.1/topics/findOverlaps-methods Rscript '$__tool_directory__/methylit_get_dimp_pat_genes.R' --input_genes '$input_genes' --input_gr '$input_gr' --ignore_strand '$ignore_strand' --output_rdata '$output_rdata' --output_type '$output_type' --script_dir '$__tool_directory__' #if str($output_log_cond.output_log) == "yes": &>'$output_log'; #else: &>output_log.txt; if [[ $? -ne 0 ]]; then cp output_log.txt '$output_data_frame'; cp output_log.txt '$output_grange'; fi #end if

param.name: input_gr
param.label: File containing any of the following objects: pDMP, InfDiv, GRangesList, GRanges or a list of GRanges
param.help: --GR: Typically produced by the MethylIT: Evaluate DMPs classificatio tool

param.name: input_genes
param.label: File containing a GRanges object with gene coordinates and gene IDs

param.name: output_type
param.label: Select class of object to be output

tool.help:
**What it does**
Counts DMPs overlapping with gene-body, and can also be used to count DMPs overlapping with any set of regions within a GRange object.
